name: Vegan Lentil Soup
author: gartenfee
summary: You'll be amazed how much flavor you get just with vegetables, legumes, and herbs. This simple, clean eating lentil soup with brown lentils is vegan and tastes great.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, or more to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place lentils in a bowl, cover with cold water, and pick out the broken ones that swim to the top
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat and cook onion until soft and translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds
Stir in tomato paste, parsley, carrot, celery, 1 teaspoon salt, and bay leaves
Pour lentils and 8 cups water into the pot
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and cook partially covered until lentils are soft, 30 to 35 minutes
Stir in mustard and red wine vinegar
Puree soup with an immersion blender until mostly smooth but some chunks remain
